snippet: Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey appeared chummy with former President Bill Clinton in an on-stage appearance at the annual Clinton Global Initiative.
abstract: Gov Chris Christie of New Jersey appears chummy with former President Bill Clinton in on-stage appearance at the annual Clinton Global Initiative; meeting between the two, who have surprising number of things in common despite being affiliated with different political parties, carries potential seeds of political intrigue and implications for possible presidential bid by Christie.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Chris Christie of New Jersey appeared chummy with former President Bill Clinton in an on-stage appearance at the annual Clinton Global Initiative.

headline.main: Clinton and Christie, 2 Politicians Sharing Wonk-Speak
headline.print_headline: For Clinton and Christie, a Chance to Converse in the Language of the Wonks
